{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-25T07:52:29.000Z", "description": "

An exciting opportunity with a technology platform catered for data-driven decision-making.


About the role:

Working with a team of experienced engineers who work to turn ideas into business wins. Help with everything in the team from Data ETLs to model serving to test reporting. A typical day will include data science modelling, data cleaning, ETL and analytics.


Requirements:

  • Experienced with big data processing - Apache Spark, SQL and Scala
  • Competent using search technologies \u2013 Lucene / Soir
  • Extensive Python knowledge and application
  • Hands on experience with gradient boosted trees (XGBoost & MML) and deep learning (TensorFlow & Keras)
  • Bachelors or higher degree in Computer Science from a top university
  • Minimum 3 years\u2019 experience of programming work experience
  • At least 1 year of Data Science, Data Engineering or Machine Learning Experience


Benefits:

  • Competitive salary
  • Comprehensive health insurance
  • 401 (k) retirement plan
  • Paid company holidays and unlimited PTO
